cause.description:
We train lawyers to provide legal protection for the poorest people in Burundi, Liberia and Zimbabwe who are arbitrarily detained, tortured and denied competent legal representation and access to a fair trial.
Our activities include:
!) Conduct regional and national training programs 2) Campaign for rights awareness 3) develop training manuals and toolkits for lawyers 4) host judicial/community roundtables and, 5) establish legal resource centers in main cities and rural provinces.
1. A just and equitable legal system is key to a stable society
cause.mission: to provide legal protection for the poorest people in Burundi and protect them from arbitrary detention and torture.
cause.name: Defend Torture Victims
